channel.title: Being on Movement: Unleashed
channel.description: Recent content in Being on Movement: Unleashed

item.title: Mastering the Body to Master Life
item.description: Mastering the Body to Master Life As a culture we tend to have two primary identification-points; that of being a body, and that of being an mind. We hold it that the mind is dependant on the body for its existence, and yet we award the mind great authority in our lives. The journey towards becoming authentic and lucid in our lives could be simply stated as one of surrendering the mind to the body.
